document_title: Digestive disorders: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Symptoms of digestive disorders depend on the cause (stomach disease, diet...). However, in general, this condition often appears with some easily recognizable signs as follows:(4)
Stomach-ache.; Chest pain or back pain; Constipation.; Diarrhea.; Difficulty swallowing.; Hiccup.; Uncontrolled defecation; Undigested.; Does not taste good; A lump appears in the throat; Nausea.; Bleed.; Gain or lose weight.
